name: Antoniotrkdz.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to Antoniotrkdz GitHub Page.
I am a neuroscientist, but I am also a student programmer.

##Here is where you can find my projects.
My first piece of of code is an [ImageJ](https://imagej.nih.gov/ij/)/[FIJI](https://fiji.sc/) macro to stitch together various stacks of images acquired with the Prairie Ultima IV Two-Photon microscopes.
For an explanation of what Two-Photon microscopy is please read [here] (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Two-photon_excitation_microscopy)

The macro _per se_ is nothing fancy, it just reorganises a set of images in a way that can then be stitched with the help of [TrackEM2](https://www.ini.uzh.ch/~acardona/trakem2.html) ImageJ/FIJI plugin    
Please read the [instructions on how to use TrackEM2]() for this purpose.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
